column2: 5. YOUR CHOICES ABOUT YOUR INFORMATION    Your account information and profile/privacy settings:   Update your account at any time by logging in and changing your profile settings.  Unsubscribe from email communications from us by clicking on the "unsubscribe link" provided in such communications. As noted above, you may not opt out of Service-related communications (e.g., account verification, purchase and billing confirmations and reminders, changes/updates to features of the Service, technical and security notices).  Learn more about reviewing or modifying your account information.
